700290.name: Close Me - New Game+ & OST Selection Soundtrack
700290.description:
New Game+ is new content for the main game you can access after beating the game once. New Game+ adds new things to the game on replay, which include new areas, new events, new secrets, and provides a new optional path through the game.


The OST Selection Soundtrack is the official soundtrack for Close Me. Once purchased, the soundtrack will be located within the main game's installation folder that you may locate by right clicking the game in your Steam Library and choosing 'Properties', going to the 'Local Files' tab, and then selecting 'Browse Local Files' (it'll be among the game's files, in a folder labelled 'OST Selection Soundtrack').

The soundtrack comes in 320kbps .mp3's, all properly labelled, all appropriately marked and labelled for easy organization with album art. There is around 34 minutes worth of music between 17 songs, including an album exclusive remix.

Spoilers below;

Tracklist:
01.) Sunny Day (0:41)
02.) All It Comes With -Dinner Version- (1:59)
03.) Drink of Water (1.30)
04.) I'm Alone (1:01)
05.) The Facility (2:25)
06.) The Hospital (1:20)
07.) All It Comes With -Maze Version- (0:43)
08.) Straining Feeling (1:23)
09.) All It Comes With -Trash Version- (1:04)
10.) The Mines (1:12)
11.) The Other Side (1:45)
12.) All It Comes With -Locked Heart Version- (0:53)
13.) Righteous Pit (3:19)
14.) Shhhame by PC-ONE (4:07)
15.) All It Comes With -Normal Version- (2:01)
16.) All It Comes With -Rough Album Version- (4:26)
17.) All It Comes With -PROCESSED Rough Album Version- (4:26)
700290.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 阿拉伯语*, 保加利亚语*, 捷克语*, 丹麦语*, 荷兰语*, 芬兰语*, 希腊语*, 匈牙利语*, 日语*, 韩语*, 挪威语*, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*, 罗马尼亚语*, 俄语*, 简体中文*, 瑞典语*, 泰语*, 繁体中文*, 土耳其语*, 乌克兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
